question: What hotel is available as I head towards Cavalier Galleries, Inc., CT within 60 kilometers from Rutgers Geology Museum, New Brunswick, NJ?
sql:
WITH
    angle AS (SELECT degrees(ST_Azimuth(ST_GeomFromText('POINT (-74.446722 40.498701)',4326)::geography, ST_GeomFromText('POINT (-73.624413 41.022246)',4326)::geography)) AS value)
SELECT * FROM pois,angle
WHERE tourism = 'hotel'
AND ST_DWithin(pois.geometry, ST_GeomFromText('POINT (-74.446722 40.498701)',4326)::geography, 60000)
AND (degrees(ST_Azimuth(ST_GeomFromText('POINT (-74.446722 40.498701)',4326)::geography, pois.geometry)) BETWEEN angle.value - 22.5 AND angle.value + 22.5);
